wikipedia_page.main: Sophia Armitt (1847 – 12 June 1908) was a British teacher, writer, and naturalist.

response: The "two happy sister spirits" were Mary Louisa Armitt who died the year before and her sister Sophia Armitt.Canon Rawsley, Armitt Museum, Retrieved 12 November 2015
*Sophia Armitt (1847–1908)m British teacher, writer, and naturalist.
